alert.note: Alert for Clay; Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 5:26PM EDT until August 15 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... South central Clay County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Early County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 615 PM EDT/515 PM CDT/. * At 526 PM EDT/426 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Abbeville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Haleburg, Barnes, Miller, Hardwickburg, Hayes and Willis Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
